Package com.apple.eawt.event

Classes for receiving gesture events.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GestureListener Marker interface for all gesture sub-types.
GesturePhaseListener Listener interface for receiving notification that a continuous gesture (like rotate or scale) has started or stopped.
MagnificationListener Listener interface for receiving magnification events.
RotationListener Listener interface for receiving rotation events.
SwipeListener Listener interface for receiving swipe events.
 

Class Summary
GestureAdapter Abstract adapter class for receiving gesture events.
GestureEvent Abstract event all gestures inherit from.
GesturePhaseEvent Event indicating the user has started or stopped a continuous gesture.
GestureUtilities Registration utility class to add GestureListeners to Swing components.
MagnificationEvent Event encapsulating a relative magnification scale performed by the user.
RotationEvent Event encapsulating a relative rotation performed by the user.
SwipeEvent Event indicating a swipe was performed by the user.
 

Package com.apple.eawt.event Description

Classes for receiving gesture events. Provides a mechanism to receive various gesture events on JComponents. Gesture notifications are relayed up the component hierarchy from the deepest component under the cursor to the top-level container. Events may be consumed by deeper components to prevent them from propagating to higher components. Gesture listeners are added to components using the GestureUtilities helper class.
